definition: lit. to get rid of the weeds and keep the flowers/to separate the wheat from the chaff (idiom)

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
overgrown with weeds
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
leek flower/lush/luxuriant

sentences.english: According to legend human bones remove impurities from the iron and steel and bestow the swords with spirit.
sentences.chinese: 根据传说，人骨使钢铁去芜存菁，并赐予剑魂魄。

sentences.english: We wanted to get rid of anything other than what was absolutely essential, but you don't see that effort.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要去芜存菁，不过你是看不到这过程的。

sentences.english: And the suppliers we integrated have been optimized too.
sentences.chinese: 藏美整合的供应商资源在不断去芜存菁中得到优化。

definition: to take the best/to absorb the essence
to remove the dross/to discard the dregs
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
to blend/to integrate/to amalgamate/to fuse
concise/compact/condensed
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
agile/nimble/deft
to develop/to evolve
variant of 洗練|洗练[xi3 lian4]
to sharpen on grindstone/to improve oneself by practice
to research carefully/to study intensively
to concentrate fully on sth/single-minded
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
quintessence/essentials
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
